# controlSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the local authentication view user interface element.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controlSize: NSControl.ControlSize { get }
```

## Controlling the size of a local authentication view

- **init(context:controlSize:)**: Creates a new authentication icon that reflects the current authentication state, using a specified size.
